mapper.update: update sys_help set catagory = #{catagory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, catagory, question, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, answer from sys_help where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, catagory, question, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, answer from sys_help
